 2021-03722021-05-11,  JUS,  ,  , 
ActOther Than Statutory Authority
PrecisAppointment of the HONOURABLE DAVID C. HARRIS, a Judge of the Court of Appeal for British Columbia, to be a member of the Independent Judicial Advisory Committee for the Province of British Columbia, to hold office during pleasure for a term ending on May 1, 2023.
